Dialogue.Page: Hold up there, hatchling! Got something for ya.

DialogueOption.Text: Nevermind that, are you seeing that ringed planet up there?

Dialogue.Page: A planet with rings around it? Nope, never seen or heard of such a thing. Did you have a weird dream or something?
I know it's the translator tool's first time out in the field today, but Hal and I have been cooking up this new orienteering tool and want you to give it a test run.
It's kind of like your signalscope, but specifically for tracking exotic energy readings. Fire, radiation, you name it.
Not ghost matter though; there's so much of that floating around in low concentrations that the readings would be useless.
Once it's locked in on a frequency, it'll continuously point towards the nearest source, wherever that happens to be, so not that useful for someone like me who stays put all day.
Speaking of, Riebeck dropped off this junk earlier. Said it might be some kind of weird Nomai tech.
Whatever it is, it's giving off strong traces of electromagnetic radiation, so maybe you can use our "compass" to track down more of it.
Enough from me though, I'll let you get to it. I'm sure you'd rather see things for yourself rather than have this old geezer talk your ears off.
